label.are_you_sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete?
label.setting_subtitle: Manage your account profile and settings
label.profile_subtitle: Update your name and email address
label.password_subtitle: Ensure your account uses a long, random password to stay secure
label.delete_account_subtitle: Delete your account and all its resources
label.whatsapp_subtitle: Set up your WhatsApp account to send notifications
label.delete_account_warning: Please proceed carefully, this action cannot be undone.
label.delete_account_are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
label.delete_account_term: Once your account is deleted, all its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Enter your password to confirm you want to permanently delete your account.
label.drag_and_drop_file_here_or_browse: Drag and drop file here or browse
label.whatsapp_not_available: This feature is not available due to an issue with the WhatsApp Gateway.

http_message.400: Invalid request. Please check the information you provided.
http_message.401: You are not logged in or do not have permission to access this page.
http_message.403: Access denied. You do not have the necessary permissions.
http_message.404: Sorry, the page or data you are looking for could not be found.
http_message.405: The method used is not allowed for this request.
http_message.408: The request took too long to complete. Please try again.
http_message.429: Too many requests. Please wait a moment before trying again.
http_message.500: Something went wrong on our server. Please try again later.
http_message.502: There was a problem with the gateway. Please try again shortly.
http_message.503: The service is currently unavailable. It might be under maintenance.
http_message.504: The server took too long to respond. Please try again later.
